os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Portable (Source code to work with many OS platforms)

name: libparallelize
short_description: This library will be design with only the features provided by the new C++11 standard. This means that the code will compile with any platform and compiler that supports the new standard. The goal of this project is to allow developers to easily add parallelization to their code without having to mess around with the perils of concurrency. This library will focus mostly on parallelizing data processing and will use a dependency system to make sure a series of operations to be performed on data are run in the right order.
summary: A C++ Library meant to make parallelization a breeze.
